about_the_game:
High Spirits is a potion-based RPG that's brewed to perfection. Transform the staff of legend into a mighty arsenal of weapons shaped by the potions you drink. Fight your way through a magical city as you overcome ever-changing encounters. High Spirits can be played solo or co-op.

WELCOME TO THE KICKIN MULE

After a party-gone-wrong, Flanagan awakens with an irate talking staff and no memory of the night before. With help from his friends at the Kickin' Mule Tavern, Flan will need to shake off his hangover and master alchemy to defeat the spirit bosses that have risen from the dead.

BREW POWERFUL SPIRITS

Collect ingredients from across the city to brew new potions with Mason's brewin' book. Potions can unlock new combat forms and elemental powers. Drink too many too quickly, and you'll discover the effects of arcane inebriation.

MEET THE PEOPLE OF BRINLEY

Explore the mystical city of Brinley and meet a magical cast of characters, portrayed in rich portrait art. Make friends or enemies but beware, your choices will shape the encounters you face while discovering the source of the lost souls.

PLAY WITH A FRIEND, OR DON'T!

Reunite with Flanagan's scattered friends to unlock them as companions in singleplayer, or plug in a controller for drop-in/drop-out co-op.

LEARN SECRETS FROM THE PAST

Uncover the secrets of the city's past in unlockable Flashback quests. Play as Maeve, a member of the excavation team as she explores the fabled ruins beneath the city.
